TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementEntityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementEntityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementEntityAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: The ManagementEntity attribute indicates that a class provides management information exposed through a WMI provider.

span.span: The ManagementEntity attribute indicates that a class provides management information exposed through a WMI provider.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不接受名稱參數。This constructor does not take a name parameter. 如果您使用未指定名稱參數，相關聯的 WMI 類別的名稱會預設為屬性化類別的名稱。If you do not specify a name by using the parameter, the name of the associated WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool External { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.External : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the class represents a WMI class in a provider implemented external to the current assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the class represents a WMI class in a provider implemented external to the current assembly.

value.span: 類別可代表外部 WMI 類別和 false 否則如果為 true 的布林值。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents an external WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作提供者可實作延伸現有的抽象 WMI 類別的類別時，會使用這項目。This is used when implementing providers that implement classes that extend existing abstract WMI classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the WMI class.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the WMI class.

value.span: 包含 WMI 類別名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the name of the WMI class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定這個屬性指定 WMI 類別的名稱，WMI 類別會預設為屬性化類別的名稱。If you do not specify the name of the WMI class by setting this property, the WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class. ## Examples 在下列範例中，Name 參數用來設定 MortgageCalcWMIProvider 類別所代表的 WMI 類別的名稱。In the following example, the Name parameter is used to set the name of the WMI class represented by the MortgageCalcWMIProvider class. 將名稱設 MortgageCalculator。It sets the name to MortgageCalculator. 如果使用的參數不是名稱，對應 C# 類別名稱，MortgageCalcWMIProvider 在此情況下，會使用與 WMI 類別名稱。If the Name parameter is not used, the corresponding C# class name, MortgageCalcWMIProvider in this case, is used as the WMI class name. ``` [ManagementEntity(Name = "MortgageCalculator")] public class MortgageCalcWMIProvider { } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Singleton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Singleton : bool with get, set

summary.span: Specifies whether the associated class represents a singleton WMI class.

span.span: Specifies whether the associated class represents a singleton WMI class.

value.span: 類別可代表單一 WMI 類別和 false 否則如果為 true 的布林值。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents a singleton WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一 WMI 類別是其中一個，可以只會有單一執行個體。A singleton WMI class is one for which there can only ever be a single instance. 雖然您可以撰寫程式碼邏輯，以確保曾經建立單一執行個體的 WMI 類別，提供這個參數屬性是為了讓工作，輕鬆且一致。Although you could code the logic to ensure that only a single instance of a WMI class is ever created, this parameter attribute is provided to make the task easy and consistent. 當使用單一 WMI 類別，用戶端應用程式必須使用特殊的語法。When working with singleton WMI classes, client applications must use special syntax. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱描述執行個體的物件路徑中的主題位於 MSDN online library [ http://www.msdn.com ](http://www.msdn.com/)。For more information, see the Describing an Instance Object Path topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼片段示範如何使用單一參數來指出 C# 類別對應至單一 WMI 類別。The following code snippet demonstrates how to use the Singleton parameter to indicate that a C# class corresponds to a singleton WMI class. ``` [ManagementEntity(Singleton=true)] public class SingletonSample ``` 如需完整的工作的範例實作的單一類別的提供者，請參閱[如何： 建立基本低耦合提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300)。For a complete, working example of a provider that implements a singleton class, see [How to: Create a Basic Decoupled Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300).
